name: Together²
description:
Joined together with your friend, you must make your way through several puzzles without straying too far away from each other!

Goal: Activate all of the pressure plates by moving your players one at a time in as few moves as possible.

Catch: You can only move to the edge of the circles, no further. These circles move with the players, so you must manipulate them to allow the other player to move.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys: Move
  • Space/Enter: Switch characters

That's all you need to know, have fun!
